@ Cooldady at 2006-10-05 01:39 GMT:

You only need VLC, the codecs are needed if you want to see the movie in other mediaplayers

Oh and boys and girls: always remember to put audio to "2-speaker"-mode if you haven't got one of those fancy 5.1-sets, or your audio will sound like shit! :)

As for this being a Madagascar Rip-Off, well, sorta.  The Wild actually went into production before Madagascar, but came out after.  The quality of the visuals in The Wild are far superior, which may be why it took so much longer for it to come out.  (Though, in my opinion, both movies aren't very good...).  This isn't exactly the first time Disney has had a movie idea taken and released first by competition, ala Antz and A Bug's Life.
